text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to butterfly shrimp?
text.Response A: Butterfly shrimp are an excellent choice of seafood, well known for their delicate flavor and tender texture.  To butterfly shrimp, you first make a shallow lengthwise cut down the back of the shrimp, being careful not to cut all the way through.  Then you gently spread the shrimp open like a butterfly, being careful not to tear the flesh.  Next, you season the shrimp with salt and pepper, and perhaps some herbs or spicy seasonings, depending on your personal taste.  Finally, you cook the shrimp gently, either by poaching, grilling, or sautéing.  Butterfly shrimp are particularly delicious when served with a tangy sauce or salsa, such as homemade cocktail sauce or mango salsa.  Enjoy!
text.Response B: I am not sure how to butterfly shrimp, but I can tell you how to butterfly a chicken breast.  First, you need to cut the chicken breast in half horizontally, so that you have two thin pieces of chicken.  Then, you need to pound the chicken thin with a mallet or a rolling pin.  Finally, you need to season the chicken with salt and pepper.  I hope this helps!

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

1048.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to butterfly shrimp?

Response A

Butterfly shrimp are an excellent choice of seafood, well known for their delicate flavor and tender texture. To butterfly shrimp, you first make a shallow lengthwise cut down the back of the shrimp, being careful not to cut all the way through. Then you gently spread the shrimp open like a butterfly, being careful not to tear the flesh. Next, you season the shrimp with salt and pepper, and perhaps some herbs or spicy seasonings, depending on your personal taste. Finally, you cook the shrimp gently, either by poaching, grilling, or sautéing. Butterfly shrimp are particularly delicious when served with a tangy sauce or salsa, such as homemade cocktail sauce or mango salsa. Enjoy!

Response B

I am not sure how to butterfly shrimp, but I can tell you how to butterfly a chicken breast. First, you need to cut the chicken breast in half horizontally, so that you have two thin pieces of chicken. Then, you need to pound the chicken thin with a mallet or a rolling pin. Finally, you need to season the chicken with salt and pepper. I hope this helps!
